name: WhoSaidIt
0:
”Alexa, launch Who Said It”
”is it three”
”repeat that”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: who said it
des:
Listen to a few famous Bollywood dialogues and guess "Who Said It". From the early days of Bollywood to today, this game contains all the coolest, funniest, and most memorable dialogues that any true Bollywood fan should recognize.

• To start playing, say "Alexa, launch Who Said It"
• Since the questions are multiple choice, just say the number corresponding to your answer.
• To repeat a question, say "repeat". 
• After 3 questions, you will receive your score which will reveal your true Bollywood knowledge.
• If you want to stop the game at any time, say "stop"

This skill is constantly updated, so you will never have to stop the fun.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
